Object.Name: IPSO Set Point
Object.Description1: This IPSO object should be use over device that manage set point such as room controllers. This object enable to set a setpoint over various units defined in the UCUM specification. A special set point is added to set the colour of an object.

Item.Name: Units
Item.Description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.

Item.Name: Colour
Item.Description: Colour of the object. A light for instance.
